Listing 14.19: Example of deﬁning an MLP forecast model.
The model will be ﬁt for some number of training epochs (exposures to the training data)
and batch size can be speciﬁed to deﬁne how often the weights are updated within each epoch.
The model fit() function for ﬁtting an MLP model on the training dataset is listed below.
